ðŸ“– Summary: Gmail TUI is a terminal-based Gmail client that allows users to manage their email directly from the command line. It offers features like composing emails, managing labels, searching, and handling attachments, all with a focus on keyboard navigation and efficiency. The application uses OAuth2 for secure authentication and provides a lightweight alternative to the web-based Gmail interface.
